description.zh-cn: 明太祖朱元璋的皇后。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Taizu of Ming (Zhu Yuanzhang).

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元朝末年红巾军领袖，朱元璋的义父。
description.en: A leader of the Red Turban Rebellion during the late Yuan dynasty, and the adoptive father-in-law of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后的父亲。
description.en: Father of Empress Xiaoci Gao.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Empress Xiaoci Gao.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋的嫡长子，明朝第一位皇太子。
description.en: The eldest son and heir apparent of Zhu Yuanzhang, the first crown prince of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋次子。
description.en: The second son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋第三子。
description.en: The third son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋第四子，明朝第三位皇帝。
description.en: The fourth son of Zhu Yuanzhang and the third emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋第五子。
description.en: The fifth son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋第四女。
description.en: The fourth daughter of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民的皇后。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Taizong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国军事将领，朱元璋的外甥。
description.en: A founding military general of the Ming dynasty and a nephew of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初期官员。
description.en: An official in the early Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初的文学家、史学家、政治家。
description.en: A writer, historian, and politician during the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初的富商。
description.en: A wealthy businessman in the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣的生母，其真实身份存在争议。
description.en: The biological mother of the Yongle Emperor (Zhu Di), whose true identity is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝，朱元璋之孙。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming dynasty, a grandson of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝。
description.en: The 12th emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元惠宗的第三任皇后，元朝最后一位皇后。
description.en: The third empress of Emperor Huizong of Yuan and the last empress of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明惠帝朱允炆的皇后。
description.en: Empress of the Jianwen Emperor (Zhu Yunwen) of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 皇帝正妻的封号。
description.en: The title of an emperor's primary consort.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代封爵之一。
description.en: One of the ancient Chinese peerage titles.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后是明太祖朱元璋的结发妻子和皇后。
description.en: Empress Xiaoci Gao was the primary wife and empress of Emperor Taizu of Ming (Zhu Yuanzhang).

description.zh-cn: 马公是孝慈高皇后的父亲。
description.en: Ma Gong was the father of Empress Xiaoci Gao.

description.zh-cn: 郑媪是孝慈高皇后的母亲。
description.en: Zheng Ao was the mother of Empress Xiaoci Gao.

description.zh-cn: 马公和郑媪是夫妻关系，二人是孝慈高皇后的父母。
description.en: Ma Gong and Zheng Ao were husband and wife, the parents of Empress Xiaoci Gao.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴是孝慈高皇后的义父。
description.en: Guo Zixing was the adoptive father of Empress Xiaoci Gao.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋曾投奔郭子兴帐下，为其下属。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang joined Guo Zixing's forces and served under him.

description.zh-cn: 郭子兴曾听信谗言猜疑朱元璋。
description.en: Guo Zixing once grew suspicious of Zhu Yuanzhang due to slander.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后出生于宿州。
description.en: Empress Xiaoci Gao was born in Suzhou.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋登基当日，册封马氏为皇后。
description.en: On the day of his enthronement, Zhu Yuanzhang proclaimed Lady Ma as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 洪武二年，朱元璋追封岳父马公为徐王。
description.en: In the second year of the Hongwu era, Zhu Yuanzhang posthumously enfeoffed his father-in-law Ma Gong as the Prince of Xu.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱标为马皇后所生，但其生母存在争议。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Biao as the son of Empress Ma, but his maternity is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱樉为马皇后所生，但其生母存在争议。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Shuang as the son of Empress Ma, but his maternity is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱㭎为马皇后所生，但其生母存在争议。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Gang as the son of Empress Ma, but his maternity is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱棣为马皇后所生，但其生母存在争议。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Di as the son of Empress Ma, but his maternity is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 正史记载朱橚为马皇后所生，但其生母存在争议。
description.en: Official histories record Zhu Su as the son of Empress Ma, but his maternity is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 宁国公主是孝慈高皇后的女儿。
description.en: Princess Ningguo was the daughter of Empress Xiaoci Gao.

description.zh-cn: 安庆公主是孝慈高皇后的女儿。
description.en: Princess Anqing was the daughter of Empress Xiaoci Gao.

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》等记载，朱棣的生母为䂵妃。
description.en: According to records such as the 'Nanjing Taichang Si Zhi', Zhu Di's biological mother was Consort Gong.

description.zh-cn: 杨宪诬告李文忠不法。
description.en: Yang Xian falsely accused Li Wenzhong of misconduct.

description.zh-cn: 在杨宪诬告李文忠后，马皇后劝说朱元璋不要轻易将李文忠召回，保住了他的职位。
description.en: After Yang Xian falsely accused Li Wenzhong, Empress Ma persuaded Zhu Yuanzhang not to recall him rashly, thus securing his position.

description.zh-cn: 为被判死罪的宋濂求情，使其最终得以赦免。
description.en: She pleaded for Song Lian, who was sentenced to death, leading to his eventual pardon.

description.zh-cn: 劝谏朱元璋不要诛杀富民沈秀（沈万三），使其免于一死。
description.en: She advised Zhu Yuanzhang against executing the wealthy civilian Shen Xiu (Shen Wansan), thereby saving his life.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后于洪武十五年九月葬于孝陵。
description.en: Empress Xiaoci Gao was buried in the Ming Xiaoling Mausoleum in September of the 15th year of the Hongwu era.

description.zh-cn: 追尊祖母马皇后为“孝慈昭宪至仁文德承天顺圣高皇后”。
description.en: Posthumously honored his grandmother Empress Ma with the title 'Empress Xiaoci Zhaoxian Zhiren Wende Chengtian Shunsheng Gao'.

description.zh-cn: 重尊母亲马氏为“孝慈昭宪至仁文德承天顺圣高皇后”。
description.en: Re-honored his mother Lady Ma with the title 'Empress Xiaoci Zhaoxian Zhiren Wende Chengtian Shunsheng Gao'.

description.zh-cn: 再次追尊马皇后为“孝慈贞化哲顺仁徽成天育圣至德高皇后”。
description.en: Again posthumously honored Empress Ma with the title 'Empress Xiaoci Zhenhua Zheshun Renhui Chengtian Yusheng Zhide Gao'.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋常将马皇后的贤慧比作唐太宗时的长孙皇后。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang often compared the wisdom and virtue of Empress Ma to that of Empress Zhangsun of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 奇皇后是元朝的末代皇后，孝慈高皇后是明朝的开国皇后，存在朝代接替关系。
description.en: Empress Gi was the last empress of the Yuan dynasty, and Empress Xiaoci Gao was the founding empress of the Ming dynasty, representing a dynastic succession.

description.zh-cn: 孝慈高皇后去世后，其孙媳马皇后（明惠帝皇后）成为后来的明朝皇后，存在接替关系。
description.en: After the death of Empress Xiaoci Gao, her grandson's wife, Empress Ma (Empress of the Jianwen Emperor), became a subsequent empress of the Ming dynasty, indicating a succession.
